author: jsalvata
msg: Make config elements work for Arguments in cases where
Arguments are actually a key->value map (such as for
the Java Sampler.) (That's oposed to when Arguments is
a set of {key,value} pairs, as in the HTTPSampler.)

author: jsalvata
msg: Making thread-safe by using READ_ONLY_MASK when compiling regexps.

author: jsalvata
msg: * Making thread-safe by using READ_ONLY_MASK when compiling regexps.
* Using a pattern cache for better performance.
